author: forthommel
body:
Track fitting procedure for the CTPPS diamond detector.
* Introduce a new data format, `CTPPSDiamondLocalTrack`, to be stored up to the AOD level.
* Associated `EDProducer` (fit procedure described in slide 3 of [this presentation](https://indico.cern.ch/event/589581/contributions/2377694/)) using the `CTPPSDiamondRecHit` collection introduced in #17535 as an input.
* Addition of an additional "multiple hits" boolean in the private attributes of `CTPPSDiamondRecHit`, and used as a quality flag by the local track fitter.

`runTheMatrix.py -l limited` yielded: `16 16 15 13 7 1 1 1 tests passed, 1 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 failed` with `4.22_RunCosmics2011A` failing at step 0 (DAS_ERROR)
title: CTPPS: Diamonds tracking
